page.title: 04THE FARMING YEAR 2
page.content: These break crops are oil seed rape,sugar beet and beans .The beans that they grow have nitrogen in them so the soil has already got fertilizer for the next years harvest.Around about 25th of July harvest starts and the combine (Class a german combine) starts to bring in the harvest.The wide cuttingbar is about 4 metres long and seperates straw from the grain then stored in a tank until the trailer comes.After it has been harvested the grain is then emptied into a trailer and taken away. Barley is used for malt and beer,wheat is used for animal food or making biscuit flour, oil seed rape is sent to Hull to produce low grade vegetable oil. Then the winter sugar beet is lifted and sent to Bury St Edmunds to be refined into sugar and animal feed.
